claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

extracted_evidence.quote: It contains purified ha proteins produced in a continuous insect cell line (expresSF+®) that is derived rom Sf9 cells of the fall army worm, Spodoptera frug i per da (which is related to moths, caterpillars and butterflies), and grown in serum free medium composed of chemically- defined lipids, vitamins, amino acids, and mineral salts. Each of the three HAs is d ihi ll li i b l i (A hlif i l expressed in this cell line using abaculo virus vector (Autograph a cali for nica nuclear polyhedrosis virus), extracted from the cells with Triton X-100 and further purified by column chromatography.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote directly describes that Flublok's hemagglutinin (HA) proteins are produced in an insect cell line using a baculovirus vector, which is the baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS), supporting the claim of a novel production platform.

extracted_evidence.quote: Flublok [Influenza Vaccine] is a sterile clear colorless injection containing recombina hemagglutinin (HA) proteins from three influenza viruses for intramuscular use.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote establishes that Flublok contains recombinant HA proteins, which is a key aspect of the novel production platform described in the claim.

extracted_evidence.quote: Each of the three HAs is d ihi ll li i b l i (A hlif i l expressed in this cell line using abaculo virus vector (Autograph a cali for nica nuclear polyhedrosis virus), extracted from the cells with Triton X-100 and further purified by column chromatography.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote specifies that the HA proteins are expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus vector, which is the core of the BEVS platform mentioned in the claim.

extracted_evidence.quote: Each 0.5 mL dose of Flublok may also contain residual amounts of baculo virus and Spodoptera frugiperda cell proteins (≤14.3 mcg), baculo virus and cellular DNA (≤10 ng), and Triton X-100 (≤100 mcg).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote provides evidence that baculovirus and insect cell components are present in the final product, further supporting the use of the BEVS platform in Flublok's production.
